website_summaries.verdict: Since specs are decidedly basic, its low price is the major reason to seek out the Nokia Lumia 530.
pros: The inexpensive Nokia Lumia 530 is equipped for HSPA+ speeds and can hold up to 128GB in external storage
It includes Microsoft's most current Windows Phone OS
cons: A surprisingly slippery body makes you a constant butterfingers, and typing is tough on the small screen
The fixed focus camera won't take close-up shots

customer_reviews.title: Nothing against the seller of course
customer_reviews.text: The phone sent me back to when I first got a phone. It was like having a RAZR with touchscreen. I couldnt get regular apps and the internet was wack. Other than that the battery life was decent and it never broke, even though I only had it for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Codey G.

customer_reviews.title: Worst buy of the year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister, and it failed after less than a year of use. T-Mobile offers a one year warranty, but you have to send the phone back, wait for a replacement, and go without a phone for the interim period. The charger broke after only 6 weeks, and after 6 months you had to insert a piece of paper between to help the battery maintain contact. Combined with T-Mobile's terrible service, which seems to work very selectively even in metropolitan areas, this phone was almost useless and a huge waste of money. I won't try Nokia or T-Mobile again.
customer_reviews.author: kidsparrow37

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: it is very difficult to open. the edge of the back case is butted up against the screen glass. Battery went in fine. Would not allow setup until SIM was installed. So of course when I had to reopen again to install sim, the screen cracked.
customer_reviews.author: TheLadyKT

customer_reviews.title: I have really like the phone---very comfortable screen and text function
customer_reviews.text: I use this phone for texting and sometimes calling professional contacts that I do not want on my main phone, and I don't use it very often. I have really like the phone---very comfortable screen and text function, etc.---but my one complaint is that I have never seen such short battery life. It can sit on the table, asleep, and not be used at all---and the battery drains by 50% or more in less than a day.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Once I turned it on it worked like magic! And it's been working great since
customer_reviews.text: Once I turned it on it worked like magic! And it's been working great since! I really like it and it's a cool phone! My only problem is the battery lowers a bit when you use it but it makes sense really. But either way it's a good phone
customer_reviews.author: PegaGamer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Tmobile dropped support for Windows phones and did a marginal job of trying to get this one working even though the prior phone was Windows.... Amazon should not be selling it. Don't but it. Zero stars
customer_reviews.author: Jon S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Well, as new as it looks, it is not 100% operational. The first time I turned it on the screen flickered and I couldn't do anything with it. I charged it (it was about 50% charged already) and reset it and it didn't seem to fix anything. The screen still flickers, and worse, sometimes it doesn't even turn on. Removing the battery doesn't make it work so I just have to let it sit and try turning it on every few minutes until it does. I do like the phone itself (when it works) so that's the only reason I gave it 2 stars. But I guess this is what happens when you order a used phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for a really decent phone. Bought this for my kids and it is easy for them to use and has the features you would expect from a smartphone at a fraction of the cost. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Britney Lowe

customer_reviews.title: One of these phones has a battery that won't charge ...
customer_reviews.text: One of these phones has a battery that won't charge and a lock on the phone where my SIM is not accepted. If I can't use it, I will be returning it. SMH
customer_reviews.author: Nanise M. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It was fully protected and brand new. It didn't have a scratch or crack at all. It was a little hard to open but other then that it was good. I just wish it could've came a little earlier. UPS left it on my porch but they never rang the doorbell or knocked to let me know so I'll give it a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Randall

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves it. For her first phone super cool. Thank you guys... Phone is affordable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It has now been approx. 4 months since I've had this phone and the touchscreen no longer works!! No wonder Microsoft is getting rid of this division. I have never dropped the phone, and haven't had it anywhere close to water. I guess i'm also too strong since after the screen stopped working I tried to open the back to remove the battery and the screen cracked. Nokia, you should never have gotten into the smartphone market. Should have kept making bricks.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my 1st generation Blackberry with this and it is excellent!! I am still learning how to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Now I am finally up-to-date! Replaced my 1st generation Blackberry with this and it is excellent!! I am still learning how to use some of the many features. Great price, great product!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Its great for those who are not too smart phone savy

customer_reviews.author: djginyc

customer_reviews.title: Good product for its price
customer_reviews.text: Good product for its price. Lack of frontal camera => difficult for video calls. I do not like the Windows Phone interface but at this price you can survive. Acceptable camera. Optimal battery life. Good sound quality. Worth the money I spent. To buy if you are looking for a functional smart phone without the need of showing the possession of an IPhone . To not buy if you want a phone to show a brand more than to call with.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

For prepaid its very awesome phone at $49.88 the price is great considering the its prepaid.

customer_reviews.title: I was not sure at first but I've grown to really like it. It does what I need it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I am an iPhone user normally but mine had gotten to where I could no longer use it so it was time. I cannot afford a new one so I got the Windows phone. I was not sure at first but I've grown to really like it. It does what I need it to do. There are a few apps I cannot get but it's no big deal. The pictures are okay but nothing spectacular. If you need a cheap phone that does the trick, this is the phone to get.

Phone runs fairly well and smooth and even came with a screen protector as well.

So, I have two unusable phones.

customer_reviews.title: Beware when buying this Nokia Lumia 530. When we ...
customer_reviews.text: Beware when buying this Nokia Lumia 530. When we got it it came packaged in a brand new T-mobile branded box but the phone itself showed clear signs that it was used. The phone had a screen protector on the screen which was covered with scratches. Apparently this is a phone that was previously used and was returned, repackaged and sold as new. The only reason why I am not returning it right this moment is because the wear appears to have been minimal and I am going to try it out for a week to see if I see any sign of damage.

product_meta.title: Nokia Lumia 530 White - No Contract (T-Mobile)
product_meta.description:
Affordable 4G SmartphoneAll the Windows Phone 8.1 features you love like Cortana, OneDrive, SKYPE, HERE Maps and HERE Drive available at your fingertipsLive Tiles keep you up to date offering instantaneous information on constantly changing data like stock updates, weather, and even social networksThis 5MP camera will ensure you capture and share all your life's moments with ease. Turn on the Lumia Selfie app to take those amazing "in the moment" selfies automatically from the rear-facing cameraCarrier: T-MobileDevice has a slot for a SIM card and a slot for a MicroSD memory card.Network Type: GSM

The battery can be charged and discharged hundreds of times, but it will eventually wear out. When the talk and standby times are noticeably shorter than normal, replace the battery. Battery Take good care of your battery, it's the life force of your phone. Use only Microsoft Mobile approved chargers designated for this phone.
